summary: Ego vehicle is driving straight on a city street. Other vehicles and pedestrians are present. A cyclist appears to be crossing the street from the left side of the road.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. Other vehicles are moving in both directions. A cyclist is crossing the street.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, other vehicles, cyclist, crosswalk, traffic lights
next_action: Ego vehicle will continue straight, potentially braking to avoid the cyclist.
